glsa.title: GnuTLS: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been fixed in GnuTLS, the worst of which can cause Denial of Service

background.p: GnuTLS is an Open Source implementation of the TLS and SSL protocols.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GnuTLS. Please review the CVE identifiers and external references below for details.

impact.p: A context-dependent attacker can cause a denial of service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GnuTLS users should upgrade to the latest version:
